content: > **if you love this design please help us by adding it to your ravelry favorites and sharing it on your favorite social media facebook instagram twitter pinterest etc thank you ** > > **10% off all yarn at knitomatic com use discount code rav17 at check out ** 1 > we reserve the right to cancel offer at any time **size** to fit head circumference ・20 21 22 23 24 inches ・child small medium large xlarge **materials** ・1 skein urth uneek worsted colour 4011 approx 200m or worsted weight yarn ・4mm/ us6 16 circular ・4 5mm/us7-16 circular needles ・4 5mm/us7 double pointed needles ・1 stitch marker ・tapestry or darning needle **gauge** 28 sts = 4 /10cm in unstretched k2p2 rib on smaller needles
